org.epochx.gp.stats
Class GPStatsEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.stats.StatsEngine
      org.epochx.gp.stats.GPStatsEngine

public class GPStatsEngine
extends StatsEngine

Generates statistics about evolutionary events within XGP.

A StatsEngine is plugged into StatsManager instances to generate those statistics that are requested from the StatsManager. When a statistic is calculated it may be dependant upon other statistic fields which will be requested from the StatsManager and may in turn be generated by this class.

Constructor Summary
GPStatsEngine(GPModel model)
          Constructs a GPStatsEngine to generate statistics on request.

getGenerationStat

public java.lang.Object getGenerationStat(java.lang.String field)
Calculates and returns the generation statistic associated with the given field provided as an argument.

Overrides:
getGenerationStat in class StatsEngine
Parameters:
field - an identifying string for the generation statistic being requested.
Returns:
an Object which is the statistic requested or null if the statistic cannot be generated by this stats engine.
